original_text: All living things finally go to the same place. We all come from the dust of the ground. And we all go back to the dust when we die. See Genesis 3:19. 3: All living things finally go to the same place. We all come from the dust of the ground. And we all go back to the dust when we die.
korean_text: 다 흙으로 말미암았으므로 다 흙으로 돌아가나니 다 한 곳으로 가거니와

sentences.original_text: All living things finally go to the same place
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 살아있는 것은 결국 같은 장소로 갑니다

sentences.original_text: We all come from the dust of the ground
And we all go back to the dust when we die
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 죽을 때 모두 흙으로 돌아갑니다
